title: Cathodoluminescence in Freshwater and Saltwater Pearls
content: Farmed pearls are an important resource, contributing over half a billion dollars (US) to the worldâ€™s economy each year [1, 2]. They are also an important reservoir of scientific information, preserving a record of the environmental conditions in which they grew. Here, we use cathodoluminescence to investigate two pearls from different environments.
